channel.title: Electrical Certification on Envision Certification

item.title: Slip Ring Project
item.description: About the Project We will be creating a pcb slip ring that lights up 2 LED lights with a USB C Connector! Slip rings are devices that allow electrical contacts through rotating bodies. Usually you would simply buy a slip ring, so the question remains, why reinvent the slip ring if it already exists? My excuse was that they're expensive. Most especially ones with a through hole in the center :( Slip rings are a good way to practice PCB and CAD design.
